revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Vegetation | name = Dead tree | class = ZTreeDead | game = Hexen | doomednum = 24 }}[[Classes]]: ZTreeDead
{{desc}}In Hexen.wad, the sprite is actually named TRE1A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR ZTreeDead { {{Property|Radius}} 10 {{Property|Height}} 96 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: ZTRE A -1 Stop } }
